Interface RollConstraint

A constraint that transfers a rotation around one axis of a source.

interface RollConstraint {
    extensions?: {
        [name: string]: any;
    };
    extras?: any;
    rollAxis: "X" | "Y" | "Z";
    source: number;
    weight?: number;
}
